Package src

Class MctsNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.MctsNode
  • public class MctsNode
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store all the information of a node in the monte carlo tree search algorithm. Also, it provides the methods to change or get this information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MctsNode​(Map map, MctsNode parent, int[] posAndInfoLeadingToThis, java.util.ArrayList<int[]> possibleMoves, boolean phaseOne)
      This constructor creates an MctsNode object.

      This method returns a list of all children the node has.

      This method returns the amount of visits this node had.

      This method returns the map of the game state the node represents.
      MctsNode getParent()
      This method returns the parent of the node

      This method returns a boolean that represents if there are moves left, that weren't already checked.

      This method returns a boolean that represents if the game state of this node is in the first, or the second phase.

      This method returns a boolean that represents if the game state is terminal.

      This method adds delta to the reward of the node.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MctsNode

        public MctsNode​(Map map,
                MctsNode parent,
                int[] posAndInfoLeadingToThis,
                java.util.ArrayList<int[]> possibleMoves,
                boolean phaseOne)
        This constructor creates an MctsNode object. This is used for the monte carlo tree search algorithm.
        Parameters:
        map - The map the game state has.
        parent - The parent mcts node. If it has no parent, it can be set to null.
        posAndInfoLeadingToThis - This int array stores a move that lead to this game state (x, y, info).
        possibleMoves - This represents a list of Moves that could follow this game state. The move is stored in an int array of the form (x, y, info).
        phaseOne - This boolean contains the current phase of the game state.

    • Method Detail

      • isTerminal

        public boolean isTerminal()
        This method returns a boolean that represents if the game state is terminal.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the game state is terminal and false otherwise.

      • isFullyExpanded

        public boolean isFullyExpanded()
        This method returns a boolean that represents if there are moves left, that weren't already checked.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the node is fully extended.

      • addChild

        public void addChild​(MctsNode newChild)
        This method adds a child node to the node it is called on.
        Parameters:
        newChild - The child that should be added.

      • getUntriedActionAndRemoveIt

        public int[] getUntriedActionAndRemoveIt()
        This method returns a random move that wasn't checked already. Also, it marks the move it returns as used. Before calling this method it needs to be checked if the node is fully expanded.
        Returns:
        Move that wasn't checked already.

      • getTotalReward

        public double getTotalReward()
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean that represents the reward that this node has.

      • getCountOfVisits

        public int getCountOfVisits()
        This method returns the amount of visits this node had.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of visits.

      • getChildNodes

        public java.util.ArrayList<MctsNode> getChildNodes()
        This method returns a list of all children the node has.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of children.

      • getMap

        public Map getMap()
        This method returns the map of the game state the node represents.
        Returns:
        Returns the map object

      • increaseVisits

        public void increaseVisits()
        This method increases the visits the node had.

      • updateReward

        public void updateReward​(double delta)
        This method adds delta to the reward of the node.
        Parameters:
        delta - The value that gets added to the reward.

      • getParent

        public MctsNode getParent()
        This method returns the parent of the node
        Returns:
        Returns the parent mcts node

      • getActionLeadingToThis

        public int[] getActionLeadingToThis()
        This method returns the move that lead to this game state.
        Returns:
        Returns an int array that represents the move (x, y, info).

      • isPhaseOne

        public boolean isPhaseOne()
        This method returns a boolean that represents if the game state of this node is in the first, or the second phase.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the game state is in the first phase and false otherwise.
